types:type.name: invoicesCsv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type invoicesCsv = Array<{| "ï»¿invoiceId": String, customerId: String, contractId: String, invoiceNumber: String, invoiceAmout: String, currencyCode: String, invoiceDueDate: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0", "separator": ","}

types:type.name: invoices
invoices_csv-json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type invoices_csv_json = Array<{| invoiceId: String, customerId: String, contractId: String, invoiceNumber: String, invoiceAmout: String, currencyCode: String, invoiceDueDate: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"invoiceId\\\":\\\"2\\\",\\\"customerId\\\":\\\"10400043\\\",\\\"contractId\\\":\\\"40008557\\\",\\\"invoiceNumber\\\":\\\"43190692660604001316550500001139691767689488\\\",\\\"invoiceAmout\\\":\\\"149.99\\\",\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"EUR\\\",\\\"invoiceDueDate\\\":\\\"2020-07-01\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: invoice
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type invoice = {| invoice: {| invoiceId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, contractId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, invoiceNumber: String, invoiceAmout: Number {"typeId": "double"}, currencyCode: String, invoiceDueDate: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"invoice\\\":{\\\"invoiceId\\\":1,\\\"customerId\\\":10400043,\\\"contractId\\\":40008557,\\\"invoiceNumber\\\":\\\"43190692660604001316550500001139691767689488\\\",\\\"invoiceAmout\\\":149.99,\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"BRL\\\",\\\"invoiceDueDate\\\":\\\"2020-07-01\\\"}}"}
